description: This week on Naked Kombat we have perhaps two of the best fighters ever seen on NK, going head to head for a battle of pure sexual dominancy. In the blue trunks we have Eli "The Hammer" Hunter with seven years of wrestling, and not to mention the thirteen years of martial arts also under his belt. His opponent fighting in the red trunks, is the undefeated Doug "The Destroyer" Acre. With his impressive thirteen years of wrestling background, The Destroyer has managed to dominate every single opponent thrown his way, and today he plans on keeping that perfect record going. Hard slams, giant fat cocks and fierce sexual aggression make this one unforgettable match as these two dynamic forces collide!
title: Eli "The Hammer" Hunter vs Doug "The Destroyer" Acre - Big Dick Match
